r.d: PhD is a PHP based Docbook renderer aimed to replace Docbook-XSL and various other requirements needed to build the PHP.net documentation.
r.n: - Fixed bug#64850 (move placement of space between <type> and <methodname> (Peter) - Fixed bug#66316 (HTML is malformed) (Peter) - Fixed bug PhD generates garbled chm on PHP 5.4.0 or later. (Yoshinari) - Change the unknown version reference to Git, not SVN. (Adam)
